content: ssk yo knit 1 yo k2tog knit 1 repeat to the last 5 stitches ssk yo knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 row 23 ws knit 1 purl 1 repeat to the last 1 stitch knit 1 row 24 rs knit 1 purl 1 repeat to the last 1 stitch knit 1 row 25 ws bind off in pattern hem lace ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ 25 ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ 24 ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ 23 ▬ o \ / o o \ / o ▬ 22 ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ 21 ▬ o \ / o o \ / o ▬ 20 ▬ ▬ ▬ ▬ 19 ▬ o \ / o o \ / o ▬ 18 ___________repeat_________ knit on the rs purl on the ws ▬ purl on the rs knit on the ws / k2tog knit 2 stitches together \ ssk slip slip knit together o yo yarn over finishing weave in ends sew the button on block and enjoy taiga hilliard designs ©taiga hilliard all rights reserved 2015 this pattern is for personal use only you can print this pattern but cannot distribute by hardcopy or electronically for free or for sale page 3
